title: 287 - Giant Little Steps
description:
What are the little things that you are doing in your life that are blocking your blessings? What thoughts are you holding on to or bad habits that preventing you from leveling up? In today's episode, the guys talk about the little things that trip them up. 
 Listener Perks
  Get fresh pre-measured ingredients delivered to your door with Hello Fresh. Go to www.Hellofresh.com/success14 and use the Promo Code “SUCCESS14” to get up to 14 FREE Meals and FREE shipping.

 Organifi is giving our listeners up to 20% off of their order! Just go to www.organifi.com/success. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime, anywhere while on the go.
